summary: Detail-oriented and analytical full-stack developer with proven expertise in Node.js, Nuxt.js, Next.js and Express.js.
Skilled in handcrafting bespoke, secure, high-performance systems that align with business objectives.
Adept at transforming complex client requirements into scalable technical solutions.
Experienced in optimizing database structures, streamlining backend processes, and automating deployment workflows.
Committed to clean, maintainable code and delivering robust, reliable software solutions.
